article.title: Sun Edison to Provide Photovoltaic Power
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sun Edison Limited Liability Corporation, Beltsville, Maryland, is being awarded a $38,400,000 firm-fixed-price contract for electricity to be provided from a photovoltaic array built, owned, and operated by the contractor, located on leased property at Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Arizona, for a period not to exceed 25 years. The 355 Contracting Squadron, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, is the contracting activity.
